post.title: Cursor MCP to RCE
post.excerpt: Looks like there is a new CVE out there against Cursor that allows attackers to run arbitrary code once you accept a file into your local repo. Bad vibes, man! https://research.checkpoint.com/2025/cursor-vulnerability-mcpoison/
post.content: Looks like there is a new CVE out there against Cursor that allows attackers to run arbitrary code once you accept a file into your local repo. Bad vibes, man! https://research.checkpoint.com/2025/cursor-vulnerability-mcpoison/
